mapper.select: SELECT MILLSHEET_DETAIL_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, MILLSHEET_NO, FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO, QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, SALE_PARTY, CREATION_TIME, FURNACE_NUMBER, ZJISHU, WEIGHT, LICENSE_NUMBER, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SPECIFICATIONS FROM CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO WHERE SPLIT_APPLY_ID = #{splitApplyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

SELECT MILLSHEET_DETAIL_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, MILLSHEET_NO, FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO, QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, SALE_PARTY, CREATION_TIME, FURNACE_NUMBER, ZJISHU, WEIGHT, LICENSE_NUMBER, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SPECIFICATIONS FROM CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO WHERE FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO = #{fatherMillsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MILLSHEET_NO NOT IN (#{millsheetNo})
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO.nextval AS millsheetDetailId FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO (SPLIT_APPLY_ID, MILLSHEET_DETAIL_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, VERSION, MILLSHEET_NO, FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO, QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, SALE_PARTY, CREATION_TIME, FURNACE_NUMBER, ZJISHU, WEIGHT, LICENSE_NUMBER, PRODUCT_CATEGORY, SPECIFICATIONS) values (#{splitApplyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{millsheetDetailId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fatherMillsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{millSheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zkunnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zlph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjishu,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zlosmenge,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zchehao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zcpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specs,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT SEQ_CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO.nextval AS millsheetDetailId FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO
SPLIT_APPLY_ID,
MILLSHEET_DETAIL_ID,
CREATED_BY,
CREATED_DT,
UPDATED_BY,
UPDATED_DT,
VERSION,
MILLSHEET_NO,
FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO,
QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE,
SALE_PARTY,
CREATION_TIME,
FURNACE_NUMBER,
ZJISHU,
WEIGHT,
LICENSE_NUMBER,
PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
SPECIFICATIONS,
STATUS,
#{splitApplyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{millsheetDetailId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{millsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fatherMillsheetNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{millsheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zkunnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{zcharg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjishu,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{zlosmenge,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{zchehao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zcpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT cmsi.SPLIT_APPLY_ID, cmsi.MILLSHEET_DETAIL_ID, cmsi.CREATED_BY, cmsi.CREATED_DT, cmsi.UPDATED_BY, cmsi.UPDATED_DT, cmsi.VERSION, cmsi.MILLSHEET_NO, cmsi.FATHER_MILLSHEET_NO, cmsi.QUALITY_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, cmsi.SALE_PARTY, cmsi.CREATION_TIME, cmsi.FURNACE_NUMBER, cmsi.ZJISHU, cmsi.WEIGHT, cmsi.LICENSE_NUMBER, cmsi.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, cmsi.SPECIFICATIONS FROM CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO cmsi INNER JOIN MILL_SHEET_HEAD MSH ON MSH.MILL_SHEET_NO = cmsi.MILLSHEET_NO
AND cmsi.SALE_PARTY = #{saleParty}
mapper.update:
update CRM_MILL_SHEET_SPLIT_INFO
set version = version + 1,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_DT = #{updatedDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MILLSHEET_DETAIL_ID = #{millsheetDetailId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
